statements: SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY last_name, first_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_accounts FROM customer_accounts GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE date_registered > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, date_registered FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY date_registered DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, date_registered FROM customer_accounts WHERE date_registered BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM order_items WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders INNER JOIN customer_accounts ON orders.customer_id = customer_accounts.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, order_items.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id WHERE products.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customer_accounts;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM order_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address_line, city, state, country FROM customer_accounts JOIN addresses ON customer_accounts.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_accounts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_accounts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT address_line, city, state, country FROM addresses WHERE country = 'USA';
